title: Russian RT Employees Begin Funneling Money Through Tenet Media to US Influencers
summary: RT employees start sending millions to Tenet Media to pay American influencers including Tim Pool and Benny Johnson for pro-Russia content without disclosure, part of $10M influence operation

sources.title: DOJ alleges Russia funded company linked to Tim Pool
Two RT Employees Indicted for Covertly Funding and Directing U.S. Company
U.S. says Russia funded media company that paid right-wing influencers millions
How Russian operatives covertly hired U.S. influencers to create viral videos

notes: $8.7 million to top 3 creators over 10 months. Pool received $100,000 per video. Influencers claim ignorance of Russian source. 90% of company deposits from Russia. Precursor to September 2024 DOJ indictment.
